Enough Israeli hostages still alive to justify war: NetanyahuIsraeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said in an interview aired on Sunday that "enough" of the 132 remaining Israeli hostages held in Gaza are alive to justify Israel's ongoing war in the region. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 15:29:58 GMT ZQVPWDPPRNKSTG52QJYPQ4X6RQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/netanyahu-says-enough-remaining-israeli-hostages-alive-warrant-gaza-war-2024-02-11/Reuters世界中东地区
Three dead in Senegal protests over delayed presidential electionThe death toll amid protests in Senegal over the postponement of the presidential election until December has climbed to three, as concerns grow that one of the remaining democracies in coup-hit West Africa is under threat. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 15:16:43 GMT XZWKXBOZCZIGFK5GTGG7YRRAEE https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/ Three-dead-senegal-protests-over-delayed-presidential-election-2024-02-11/Diadie Ba, Ngouda Dione世界非洲
Ukrainian man accused of espionage dies in Russian prisonA 71-year-old Ukrainian man died in Russia in December awaiting trial for espionage and other crimes, human rights organisation Memorial said on Sunday, citing court documents. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 14:53:45 GMT UHPI6WWJYJI2FCDEDQM42AZDIM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-man-accused-of-espionage-dies- Russian-prison-2024-02-11/Reuters世界欧洲
Children traumatised by Nepal quake need aid to rebuild lives, UNICEF saysAbout 68,000 children and their families who survived Nepal’s deadliest quake in eight years need further humanitarian aid to rebuild their lives, UNICEF said on Sunday, 100 days after the tremors that devastated parts of west Nepal. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 14:51:05 GMT GXR63M277JMRXFEFEPBDGRVWAM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/children-traumatized-by-nepal-quake-need-aid-rebuild-lives-unicef-2024-02-11/Gopal Sharma世界亚太地区
Netanyahu says he has not spoken to Biden since 'over the top' remarksIsraeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Sunday he has not spoken to U.S. President Joe Biden since the president made remarks about Israel's military response to Hamas being "over the top." Sun, 11 Feb 2024 14:38:51 GMT 3PD5LWLEXNLU7DZ3WRLG5SSP4U https://www.reuters.com/world/netanyahu-says-he-has-not-spoken-biden-since-over-top-remarks-2024-02-11/Reuters世界
14 injured after tree falls onto rollercoaster in SpainSome 14 people were injured, two seriously, on Sunday after a tree fell onto a rollercoaster at PortAventura in Tarragona, eastern Spain, the theme park said. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 14:08:53 GMT RIHB5KG6YRJPVLO5ALJ6SA3U4A https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/14-injured-after-tree-falls-onto-rollercoaster-spain-2024-02-11/Reuters世界欧洲
Desperate Gazans in Rafah fear coming Israeli assaultThe Abu Mustafa family's tent is hard against the high concrete and metal fence separating Gaza from Egypt in Rafah, the last relatively safe place in an enclave devastated by Israel's military offensive, but one that may now also come under attack. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 13:44:42 GMT ORJHUFTK3ZMA7O6PYZCYBNTGUE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/desperate-palestinians-gaza-rafah-fear-coming-israeli-assault-2024-02-11/Mohammad Salem, Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东地区
Palestinian refugees in West Bank fear UNRWA closureThe UN agency is a lifeline for Palestinian refugees across Gaza and the Middle East. They fear key services will stop after donors paused funding over accusations that staff members took part in Hamas' Oct. 7 attack. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 13:08:17 GMT L6R3A6DCKFJMJFBYESIGBVQD™ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/palestinian-refugees-fear-unrwa-closure-2024-02-11/Yosri Al Jamal世界中东地区
Western officials criticize Trump's NATO commentsThe White House earlier called the remarks about not protecting NATO allies "appalling and unhinged." King Charles attends church in first public outing since cancer diagnosis announcedBritain's King Charles attended church on Sunday in his first public outing since announcing last week he had been diagnosed with cancer and would postpone some engagements to undergo treatment. Senate faces new test on Ukraine aid billA narrowly divided U.S. Senate will try to move closer to passing a $95.34 billion aid package for Ukraine, Israel and Taiwan on Sunday, while hoping to show enough bipartisan support to propel the measure all the way through Congress. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 11:03:14 GMT 45CRWY7UZVM5TAD4G2VIZWWMKE https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-senate-faces-new-test-ukraine-aid-bill-2024-02-11/David Morgan世界美国
